REPORT.name: Важные сообщения
REPORT.description: Сообщения системы --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code: select [Logs].[moment] as [Время], [Logs].[message] as [Сообщение], [Users].[name] as [Пользователь] from [Logs] inner join [Users] on ([Logs].[operator] = [Users].[id]) where (moment>=%TIME-START%) and (moment<=%TIME-STOP%) order by [Logs].[moment] desc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
